thread.title: Boko Haram takes on Cameroon army
thread.title_full: Boko Haram takes on Cameroon army | News24

author: news24.com
title: Boko Haram takes on Cameroon army
text:
Douala - Fighters from Nigeria's Boko Haram group clashed with soldiers in neighbouring Cameroon on Friday after raiding a village in a remote border region that aid groups say is turning into a war zone.
The Islamist militant fighters attacked Kerawa in Cameroon's Far North Zone on Thursday afternoon, leaving at least 12 people dead, one official said, the same day as a similar raid nearby and a suicide bombing in neighbouring Chad.
"They [Boko Haram] slit the throats of between three and seven people yesterday and killed others," the official added.
Cameroon's army clashed with the attackers on Friday, locals added, though there were no details on casualties.
